sen.j: 水指（みずさし）は、茶道具のひとつ。
茶道で、点茶の際、茶釜に水を足したり、水で茶碗や茶筅をすすぐため、蓄えておく水器。
sen.e: It is a container for storing water, which is used for adding more water to chagama (iron pot used in tea ceremony) and rinsing tea bowls and chasen (tea whisk) with water, when making tea in tea ceremony.
